original_text: And he made a molten sea, ten cubits from the one brim to the other: it was round all about, and his height was five cubits: and a line of thirty cubits did compass it round about.
korean_text: 또 바다를 부어 만들었으니 그 직경이 십 규빗이요 그 모양이 둥글며 그 높이는 다섯 규빗이요 주위는 삼십 규빗 줄을 두를 만하며

sentences.original_text: And he made a molten sea
ten cubits from the one brim to the other:
sentences.korean_translation: 한쪽 가장자리에서 다른쪽 가장자리까지는 십 규빗이었으며

sentences.original_text: and his height was five cubits:
and a line of thirty cubits did compass it round about.
sentences.korean_translation: 서른 규빗의 줄이 그것을 둘레로 두르고 있었다.
